thread.title: Game reserve employee pleads guilty to R5.2m theft
thread.title_full: Game reserve employee pleads guilty to R5.2m theft | News24

author: news24.com
title: Game reserve employee pleads guilty to R5.2m theft
text:
Nelspruit - A Londolozi employee accused of stealing more than R200 000 in cash and transferring more than R5m from the world-famous game reserve's bank account has pleaded guilty.
Wade Morgan Williams, 30, pleaded guilty to theft, vehicle theft, gun pointing and kidnapping when he appeared in the Nelspruit Regional Court on Thursday. The case has been postponed for a month.
His Legal Aid lawyer Cebo Vilakazi presented his plea statement to the court.
State prosecutor Isbet Erwee told the court the state was waiting for social workers to compile a pre-sentencing report on the accused's personal circumstances.
